mapper.select: SELECT bal.code AS code, bal.name AS name, bd.department_name AS departmentName, bal.opt_object AS optObject, bal.description AS description, bal.opt_time AS optTime FROM permission_user AS pu RIGHT JOIN basicinfo_action_log AS bal ON (bal.user_code = pu.code) LEFT JOIN basicinfo_department AS bd ON (pu.department_code = bd.code)

SELECT bal.code AS code, bal.name AS name, bd.department_name AS departmentName, bal.opt_object AS optObject, bal.description AS description, bal.opt_time AS optTime FROM permission_user AS pu RIGHT JOIN basicinfo_action_log AS bal ON (bal.user_code = pu.code) LEFT JOIN basicinfo_department AS bd ON (pu.department_code = bd.code) WHERE (bal.opt_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime})
